api_key_tooltip: Your Google Gemini API key. Obtain it from Google AI Studio. This key is necessary for the AI to function.
chat_length_tooltip: Number of past conversation turns (user message + bot reply) for the AI to remember. Higher values provide more context but may consume more resources.
activation_word_tooltip: The word or phrase to say to activate the bot and make it start listening for commands.
stop_words_tooltip: Words or phrases that, when spoken while the bot is listening, will make it stop listening. Separate multiple entries with a comma.
open_links_tooltip: If checked, any web links (URLs) found in the bot's responses will be automatically opened in your default web browser.
active_system_prompt_tooltip: Choose the set of instructions and personality traits (the 'system prompt') that the AI will use. You can manage these prompts via the 'Manage Prompts...' button.
tts_voice_tooltip: Select the language and voice used for the bot's text-to-speech (TTS) output. This is independent of the UI language.
microphone_tooltip: Select the microphone device for speech input. 'System Default' uses your OS's default microphone.
speaker_tooltip: Select the speaker device for audio output (TTS, sounds). 'System Default' uses your OS's default speaker.
ui_language_tooltip: Select the display language for the application's user interface. Changes may require restarting the settings window or application to fully apply.
prompt_text_label: Prompt Text (suffix for TTS/links added automatically; use {name} for activation word):
confirm_delete_prompt_message: Are you sure you want to delete the prompt '{prompt_name}'?
prompt_name_exists_error: A prompt with the name '{new_name}' already exists.
cannot_rename_default_prompt_error: Cannot rename the default system prompt.

chat_length_positive_integer_error: Chat length must be a positive integer.
chat_length_integer_error: Chat length must be a valid integer (not empty or text).
chat_length_value_error: Chat length must be an integer (e.g. 5).
